Class Ant

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      MovingActor
          Ant
Direct Known Subclasses:
MyAnt
public abstract class Ant
extends MovingActor

Class implementing the basic needs for an Ant. Implementing the method getForces() is enough to get a full functional Ant. The class can not be initialized, because it has been declared "abstract".

Constructor Detail

Ant

public Ant()
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Acting method for greenfoot. First we adjust the velocity using the forces that effect the ant, then we rotate the image of the ant towards the heading, move the ant and finally check to see if there has been any collisions with other ants.

Overrides:
act in class MovingActor

imDead

public void imDead()
Method that handles what happens when the ant dies. Removes itself from the world and adds a dead ant instread.
